folder.h1: Factor-augmented vector autoregressions: FAVAR objects and functions

ul.li: userdata – Get or set user data in an IRIS object.
VAR – Return a VAR object describing the factor dynamics.
estimate – Estimate FAVAR using static principal components.
filter – Re-estimate the factors by Kalman filtering the data taking FAVAR coefficients as given.
forecast – Forecast FAVAR factors and observables.

folder.h3: Getting on-line help on FAVAR functions
